s.text: Adherent vascular lung neutrophils were isolated from rats as previously described [ 10 ] . Briefly, the lung was perfused with 50 ml of warm (37¡C) Ca +2/Mg +2-free Hank's balanced salt solution (HBSS, pH 7.4) containing 2.5 mM HEPES, 0.5 mM EGTA and 4.4 mM NaHCO 3 at a rate of 22 ml/min and then lavaged 5-6 times with HBSS to remove alveolar macrophages and loosely adhered neutrophils.
